org.codeandmagic.timeline
Class LinearHorizontalLocator

java.lang.Object
  org.codeandmagic.timeline.PrecachedHorizontalLocator
      org.codeandmagic.timeline.LinearHorizontalLocator
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHorizontalLocator, TimelineViewAware
public class LinearHorizontalLocator
extends PrecachedHorizontalLocator

EventHorizontalLocator which positions Events linearly based on a provided scaling factor. Otherwise said the position is equal with the time distance from the 0 time ( TimelineView.getZeroDate() ) to the date of the event divided by the scaling factor ( getScale() ).

Author:
cristi
